Html:
There are some new features added in the Task Scheduler included with Windows 8 and Server 2012. I am asking for some feedback in regards to the UI. In the past, I have stayed true to the UI in the Task Scheduler provided in the OS. However, I have found it doesn't support the new features. I am looking for a debate on deviating from the UI to include the new features, or remaining true. Please comment.

By the way, I have included those new features in the base library for programmatic access. This debate is on whether to update the UI library accordingly.

﻿
